member.name: T:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client
member.summary: POP3 Client extending a System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient to send/receive POP3 command/responses.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Connect(System.String)
member.summary: Connects the object with the remote POP server using the given parameters.
member.param: Remote POP server address.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connects the object with the remote POP server using the given parameters.
member.param: Remote POP server address.
The port to be used.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.APOPConnect(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Connects the object with the remote POP server using the given parameters and APOP.
member.param: Username on the remote POP server.
Password on the remote POP server.
Remote POP server address.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.APOPConnect(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Connects the object with the remote POP server using the given parameters and APOP.
member.param: Username on the remote POP server.
Password on the remote POP server.
Remote POP server address.
Port to be used.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Authenticate(System.String,System.String,ActiveUp.Net.Mail.SaslMechanism)
member.summary: Authenticates using the given SASL mechanism.
member.param: Username to authenticate as.
Password.
SASL mechanism to be used.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnects the client from the remote server.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Command(System.String)
member.summary: Sends the provided string to the server.
member.param: The string to be sent to the server.
member.remarks: This method is to be used only with commands that return single-line responses.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.CommandMultiline(System.String)
member.summary: Sends the provided string to the server.
member.param: The string to be sent to the server.
member.remarks: This method is to be used only with commands that return multi-line responses.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.GetStream
member.summary: Gets the communacation stream of this object.
member.returns: A Stream object, either of type NetworkStream or SslStream if the channel is secured.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.DeleteMessage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Marks the message with the given index for deletion on the remote POP server.
member.param: Index of the message to mark for deletion.
member.remarks: This action can be cancelled by using the Reset() method before disconnection.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Reset
member.summary: Unmarks all messages that were marked for deletion.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.RetrieveMessage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the message at the given index.
member.param: The index of the message to be retrieved.
member.returns: A byte array containing the message data.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.RetrieveMessage(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the message at the given index.
member.param: The index of the message to be retrieved.
If true, the message will be deleted after it has been retrieved.
member.returns: A byte array containing the message data.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.RetrieveMessageObject(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the message at the given index.
member.param: The index of the message to be retrieved.
member.returns: A Message object representing the message.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.RetrieveMessageObject(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the message at the given index.
member.param: The index of the message to be retrieved.
If true, the message will be deleted after it has been retrieved.
member.returns: A Message object representing the message.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.StoreMessage(System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves and stores the message at the specified index to the specified path. Deletes the message once retrieval operation is complete.
member.param: Index of the message to be retrieved.
If true, the message will be deleted after it has been retrieved.
The path where the message has to be stored.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.RetrieveHeader(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the Header of the message at the given index, plus a given number of lines beyond the Header limit.
member.param: Index of the Header to be retrieved.
Number of lines to retrieve after the Header separation.
member.returns: A byte array containing the Header data.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.RetrieveHeaderObject(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the Header of the message at the given index.
member.param: Index of the Header to be retrieved.
member.returns: A Header object representing the header.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.StoreHeader(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves and stores the message Header at the specified index to the specified path.
member.param: Index of the message Header to be retrieved.
The path where the Header has to be stored.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.GetUniqueId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Issues a UIDL command and retrieves the message's unique Id (assigned by the server).
member.param: The message's index.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.GetMessageSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the size of the message at the given index.
member.param: Index of the messages.
member.returns: The size of the message at the given index.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Noop
member.summary: Performs a NOOP command on the server. The aim of this command is to keep the connection alive.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.CheckAPOP(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if specified host has APOP capability.
member.param: Host to be checked.
Port to connect on to the host.
member.returns: True is remote server has APOP, otherwise false.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.CheckAPOP(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if specified host has APOP capability.
member.param: Host to be checked.
member.returns: True is remote server has APOP, otherwise false.

member.name: M:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.GetServerCapabilities
member.summary: Gets the server capabilities.
member.remarks: Server capabilities are returned as an array of lines. Interpretation is left to the user.
member.returns: An array of strings containing the server capabilities.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Authenticating
member.summary: Event fired when authentication starts.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Authenticated
member.summary: Event fired when authentication completed.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Nooping
member.summary: Event fired when NOOP command is issued.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Nooped
member.summary: Event fired when NOOP command completed.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.TcpWriting
member.summary: Event fired when a command is being written to the server.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.TcpWritten
member.summary: Event fired when a command has been written to the server.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.TcpReading
member.summary: Event fired when a response is being read from the server.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.TcpRead
member.summary: Event fired when a response has been read from the server.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.MessageRetrieving
member.summary: Event fired when a message is being requested using the RetrieveMessage() method.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.MessageRetrieved
member.summary: Event fired when a message is being retrieved using the RetrieveMessage() method.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.HeaderRetrieving
member.summary: Event fired when a message Header is being requested using the RetrieveHeader() method.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.HeaderRetrieved
member.summary: Event fired when a message Header has been retrieved using the RetrieveHeader() method.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Connecting
member.summary: Event fired when attempting to connect to the remote server using the specified host.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Connected
member.summary: Event fired when the object is connected to the remote server or when connection failed.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Disconnecting
member.summary: Event fired when attempting to disconnect from the remote server.

member.name: E:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.Disconnected
member.summary: Event fired when the object disconnected from the remote server.

member.name: P:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.MessageCount
member.summary: Number of messages on the remote POP server.

member.name: P:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.TotalSize
member.summary: Size of all messages on the remote POP server.

member.name: P:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Client.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether this instance is connected.
member.value: true if this instance is connected; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Exception
member.summary: Custom exception.

member.name: P:ActiveUp.Net.Mail.Pop3Exception.Message
member.summary: Message returned by the server or error description.
